name: FAILD
description:
A game for the Wowie 3.0 Jam

You are a little Robot in a testing facility!

Definitely do what you're told...
It'll all be OK....

WASD to move, - Space to jump - E  or Mouse Click - To push/interact with objects




This game uses many sounds from freesound.org:

"Doepfer-a-110-1-vco-sine-e5”,"doepfer-a-110-1-vco-sine-f-4”, “doepfer-a-110-1-vco-sine-f-3”, “doepfer-a-110-1-vco-sine-a3”, “doepfer-a-110-1-vco-sine-a4” by cabled-mess ( http://freesound.org/s/soundID/ ) licensed under CCBYNC 3.0
